Name: The Ancient Daiquiri
Ingredients: 30 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
15 ml Green Chartreuse (or alternative herbal liqueur)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Review: Herbal liqueurs heavily influence this Daiquiri twist.
History: Created in 2008 by Lewis Jaffrey, Drambuie's Global Brand Ambassador. According to Lewis, it is so named because the ingredients have a combined age of over 650 years.
Nutrition: One serving of The Ancient Daiquiri contains 190 calories
